name: Straight Out Of Hell
description:
Letter from the developer:

I'm thrilled to introduce my entry to the 2022 Epic Megajam, powered by 24 cups of coffe and heavy insomnia. 

Creating this game was a huge step for me, since this is the first time that I (almost..) only used my very own assets to create a game. From textures and materials made in substance, to the animations, even the zombie characters in blender. I'm very proud of this.

Unfortunately, I still managed to run out of time, without being able to create my own background musics and some sound effects. 

Story:

Somehow, you have managed to escape from the fiery pits of hell and climb into the surface of the earth. When you arrive, you find out that your buddies are already planning to enter heaven in the most unorthodox way possible.  However, to carry out this plan, you must go back to the depths of hell once again, and free yourself from the undead's curse, preventing all unathorized entry to paradise. 

Controls: 

W A S D - Movement
CTRL(If avaiable) - Dodge
LMB - Main weapon attack 
LMB(HOLD) - Heavy attack
RMB - Secondary action 
Mouse Wheel - Switch secondary
1 , 2  - change main weapons
E - Interact

Trailer link: https://youtu.be/Dl_Yb8zEZhQ

Sourced Assets:

-1 rock mesh, 1 tree mesh 1 bridge mesh along with some untextured ground pieces  from Greenwood Village pack

-1 skeleton character mesh from Stylized Modular Skeletons along with the lower half of a knight armor set character from Fantasy Knight Set

-3 background music from Mega Game Music collection"

-1 or 2 sound effects from freesound.org
